title: Rainy city driving, almost stopped at intersection
caption: Ego vehicle driving slowly in a busy city intersection on a rainy day.
context: This clip is from ego vehicle index 1 in the CARLA simulation. Weather is rainy (softRainNoon). The ego vehicle is almost stopped (average speed â‰ˆ 0.0 m/s). There are 30 braking events or strong decelerations in this window.
description: The road is wet from the rain, and there are several other cars driving around. The traffic light is red, and there is a pedestrian crossing the street. The weather is foggy, and the visibility is low.
reasoning: The ego vehicle is driving slowly to avoid any accidents due to the slippery road caused by the rain. It is also maintaining a safe distance from other vehicles and pedestrians to ensure their safety. The driver is being cautious and paying close attention to the traffic light and the pedestrian's movements.
